Our team prioritizes your feature requests to maximize your return on investment.Personalized supportTake advantage of 24/5 priority support. And if you encounter complex problems, your Success Manager is committed to solving them within 24 hours.We integrate Tidio with your business toolsSee all integrationsand more than 120+ tools to integrateMaximize your customer service ROI with expert guidanceContact salesFrequently Asked QuestionsCommon questions about Tidio+, answeredWhy should I pick Tidio+?Compared to Tidio’s core plans, Tidio+ offersTailored limitsCustomizationPremium features, such as Departments, multisite & multilanguage support, or API accessExpert guidance so you can skip the guesswork, such as working with an implementation team and a dedicated success manager.How can Tidio+ help my business?Tidio+ focuses on four business objectives: providing AI support, automating support tasks, lead generation, and boosting revenue. Your success manager will work with you to define your KPIs, report on your progress, and offer improvement suggestions.Why do I need Tidio+?Tidio+ helps engage more of your visitors, improve their experience, and turn them into customers. Our experts will set up Lyro AI Chatbot and will build Flows for your website so you can reach your business objectives.How much does Tidio+ cost?Tidio+ is a fully customizable plan. Every Tidio+ subscription includes our premium services - implementation specialist, dedicated customer success manager, and training.The final price of your subscription is correlated to the number Flows triggers and AI support you need, but our sales team will work with you to create a custom solution that fits your budget.How long will the implementation take?Implementing Tidio+ generally takes one or two weeks. However, the process can take four weeks or more, depending on the complexity of your solution. The customer success team will let you know how long it will take during your call.What does the onboarding process look like for Tidio+ users?Once you’re a Tidio+ user, you’ll have a call with your dedicated success manager to discuss your goals and requirements. The success team, along with the implementation specialists, will customize the solution for you and schedule training sessions for you and your team.Your success manager will stay in touch with you throughout your subscription, and you can always contact them if you need any help.How many Flows triggers do I need?Our team will work with you to determine how many Flows triggers you need based on your monthly website traffic and your business goals. Some businesses can get by with 1,000 Flows triggers while others need tens of thousands to make things easier for their support teams.What is the difference between Tidio's Flows and Lyro?Flows rely on pre-designed paths while Lyro uses artificial intelligence and natural language processing to understand questions and have human-like conversations with customers. Lyro uses your support content to provide detailed answers and make sure customers are satisfied with their answers.Can I customize the live chat widget?Yes, you can. All Tidio+ users can customize the appearance and behavior of their live chat widget. Our team will work with you to create a widget that matches your brand’s style.Can I use Tidio+ on multiple websites?Yes, Tidio+ enables you to cover multiple websites at the same time.Can you build Flows for me?Our team will build Flows based on your objectives and train you and your team on how to use Tidio to its full potential.Tidio>Tidio PlusTidioAbout usContactPartner ProgramsJobs – We're hiring!SecurityStatus PageProductPricingLyro AI ChatbotLive ChatFlowsHelp DeskTidio+All featuresProduct UpdatesIntegrationsShopifyWordPressAll platformsMessengerInstagramWhatsAppAll appsResourcesAll ResourcesBlogCase StudiesHelp CenterTidio vs. GorgiasTidio vs. IntercomTidio vs. LiveChatTidio vs. ZendeskHelp CenterInstallationGet StartedIntegrationsFlows setupDevelopersContact salesPricing★★★★★★★★★★4.7 on Shopify4.7 on G24.8 on CapterraJoin 300k+ businesses that use TidioImprove your business with sales, support, and customer service automationGet started freeAvailable on:BrowserAndroidiOSWindowsMacCHATBOTBest AI ChatbotsHow to Create a ChatbotBest Chatbot AppsBest Chatbot BuildersBest AI Chatbot PlatformsLIVE CHATFree Live Chat SoftwareHow to Add Live Chat to a WebsiteEcommerce Live ChatBest Live Chat SoftwareLive Chat for SalesCUSTOMER SERVICEBest Help Desk SoftwareChat Widgets for WebsitesLive Chat for Customer ServiceWordPress Chatbot PluginsCustomer Service ChatbotsSALESEcommerce Chatbots Real Estate ChatbotsSales ChatbotsChatbots for BusinessBest Real Life ChatbotsPLATFORMSShopify Live Chat AppsShopify Chatbot AppsWordPress Chat PluginsSquarespace Chat PluginsMagento Live Chat ExtensionsCHANNELSInstagram ChatbotsFacebook Messenger ChatbotWhatsApp ChatbotInstagram Bots for ReactionsWhatsApp AutomationsTidio 2024.
